title: Meta boss ignored Clegg's call for better child protection
text: Mark Zuckerberg, the founder of Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META, ETR:FB2A, SWX:FB), reportedly declined a request from Nick Clegg, the company's head of global affairs, to significantly increase the staff dedicated to child protection on Facebook and Instagram. Internal communications disclosed ahead of a Congressional hearing on the issue showed the former Lib Dem leader appealing for the hiring of between 45 to 124 new staff members, aimed at bolstering the platforms' commitments to safety.

title: Facebook, the social network old-timer, turns 20
text: Founded 20 years ago as a simple hangout spot for young people, Facebook has since become a battle-hardened behemoth that—despite perceptions of being for boomers and parents—continues growing and growing.

title: Meta, X, TikTok, Snap and Discord face growing appetite in Congress for tighter social media regulation
text: Wall Street doesn't seem worried the tech firms will take significant financial hits to their businesses from Congress.

title: Powell Dubious on March Cut, Markets Slide
text: Markets pulled back from their steady trading levels today — three of which were in the red all session; only the Dow kept its head above water through the morning — once Fed Chair Jerome Powell, speaking at his press conference following the latest Fed meeting, expressed he was agnostic about a March rate cut. Indices jumped higher on the Fed's release initially, but in terms of forecasting a March move lower than the current 5.25-5.50% interest rate levels, Powell said that this was “not the most-likely case.

title: Should Investors Buy the Dip in Alphabet or Microsoft Stock After Earnings?
text: Over the last year, Alphabet and Microsoft's stock have soared +41% and +60% respectively and investors may be wondering if today's selloff is a buying opportunity.

title: Threads is working on surfacing Trends, says Instagram head Adam Mosseri
text: Instagram Threads will adopt another Twitter/X feature: trends, the company has confirmed.

title: Meta's continued rally could hinge on the fortunes of upstart retailers Temu and Shein
text: Online retailers Temu and Shein, which are both based in the China region, helped contribute to Meta's ad rebound in 2023.

title: Meta CEO Zuckerberg apologizes to parents at US Senate social media hearing
text: Meta Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg on Wednesday apologized to families at a U.S. Senate hearing about the impact that social media has on children.

title: Will Higher Ad Revenues Aid Meta Platforms (META) Q4 Earnings?
text: Meta Platforms' (META) fourth-quarter 2023 results are expected to reflect the benefits of improving advertising business.

title: Big Tech earnings: Disappointed market expects infinite AI money glitch
text: Big Tech stocks were in the outtray on Wednesday despite and undeniably bullish trio of earnings results emerging from the US megacap cohort. The least affected of the trio, Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT), was last seen around one percentage point lower.

title: Meta Platforms is primed for a big quarter with ads, AI push
text: A rebound in advertising, the threat of regulation and the specter of AI are the overriding narrative themes when Meta Platforms Inc. reports its fourth-quarter results on Thursday.

title: Big Tech faces another day of reckoning on Capitol Hill over kids' online safety
text: Big Tech was in the crosshairs yet again Wednesday as a handful of executives fielded blistering questions in a Senate hearing about the impact of their products on children.

title: Mark Zuckerberg, TikTok and X CEOs grilled at hearing: ‘You have blood on your hands'
text: "You have a product that's killing people," Lindsey Graham told Zuckerberg.

title: Is a Surprise Coming for Meta Platforms (META) This Earnings Season?
text: Meta Platforms (META) is seeing favorable earnings estimate revision activity and has a positive Zacks Earnings ESP heading into earnings season.

title: Meta chief Mark Zuckerberg 'needs to do the right thing' in child sex targeting fight: New Mexico AG
text: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg is testifying at a hearing about child sex exploitation online. His Facebook and Instagram sites are the target of related lawsuits.

title: CEOs of Meta, X, Discord, TikTok and Snap testify before Senate Judiciary Committee
text: Congress today is grilling the chief executives of several big tech companies, including Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, about potential harms from their products on teens.

title: Mark Zuckerberg rejected requests in 2021 to expand Meta's child-safety teams: docs
text: Meta chief Mark Zuckerberg turned down requests from his top brass back in August 2021 to expand the company's child-safety and well-being workforce, emails released by Congress revealed.

title: 2 upgraded food stocks with super-sized gain potential
text: Signs of a soft economic landing and hopes for an aggressive Fed rate cut campaign have helped the S&P 500 finish higher in 12 of the last 13 weeks. Come Friday's closing bell, will it be 13 of 14?

title: Alphabet results could bode well for Amazon and Meta, says Wedbush
text: Google parent Alphabet's Inc.'s fourth-quarter results could spell good news for Amazon.com Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc. who are on deck this week, according to Wedbush analyst Dan Ives.

title: META Stock Earnings Preview: What to Do if Investors ‘Sell the News'
text: Ahead of its upcoming quarterly earnings release, Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META ) stock has been zooming higher. As a result, META has re-joined the “Trillion Dollar Club,” or the group of stocks with market caps of $1 trillion or higher.

title: Lawmakers to grill CEOs of Meta, TikTok, X and other social media firms at hearing on child safety
text: Meta has been hit with a number of lawsuits in recent months over the well-being of children on its apps like Facebook and Instagram.

title: Meta, TikTok, X CEOs to face tough questions on child safety at US Senate hearing
text: The chief executives of social media companies Meta , X, TikTok, Snap , and Discord will face tough questions Wednesday on efforts to combat online child sexual exploitation at a U.S. Senate hearing on Wednesday.

title: Meta rents Spanish real estate company Merlin's data centres, Cinco Dias says
text: Facebook owner Meta Platforms has rented Spanish real estate firm Merlin Properties' data centres, newspaper Cinco Dias reported on Wednesday, citing unidentified sources in the technology sector.
